member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.#ctor(System.Numerics.Vector4)
member.summary: Constructs a Plane from the given Vector4.

member.summary: Creates a Plane that contains the three given points.
member.param: The first point defining the Plane.
The second point defining the Plane.
The third point defining the Plane.
member.returns: The Plane containing the three points.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.Normalize(System.Numerics.Plane)
member.summary: Creates a new Plane whose normal vector is the source Plane's normal vector normalized.

member.summary: Transforms a normalized Plane by a Matrix.
member.param: The normalized Plane to transform. This Plane must already be normalized, so that its Normal vector is of unit length, before this method is called.
The transformation matrix to apply to the Plane.

member.summary: Transforms a normalized Plane by a Quaternion rotation.
member.param: The normalized Plane to transform. This Plane must already be normalized, so that its Normal vector is of unit length, before this method is called.
The Quaternion rotation to apply to the Plane.
member.returns: A new Plane that results from applying the rotation.

member.summary: Calculates the dot product of a Plane and Vector4.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.DotCoordinate(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Returns the dot product of a specified Vector3 and the normal vector of this Plane plus the distance (D) value of the Plane.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Plane.DotNormal(System.Numerics.Plane,System.Numerics.Vector3)
member.summary: Returns the dot product of a specified Vector3 and the Normal vector of this Plane.

member.name: T:System.Numerics.Quaternion
member.summary: A structure encapsulating a four-dimensional vector (x,y,z,w), which is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where w = cos(theta/2).

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.X
member.summary: Specifies the X-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Y
member.summary: Specifies the Y-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Z
member.summary: Specifies the Z-value of the vector component of the Quaternion.

member.name: F:System.Numerics.Quaternion.W
member.summary: Specifies the rotation component of the Quaternion.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.#ctor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Constructs a Quaternion from the given components.

The Y component of the Quaternion.
The Z component of the Quaternion.
The W component of the Quaternion.

member.summary: Constructs a Quaternion from the given vector and rotation parts.
member.param: The vector part of the Quaternion.
The rotation part of the Quaternion.

member.summary: Calculates the length of the Quaternion.
member.returns: The computed length of the Quaternion.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.LengthSquared
member.summary: Calculates the length squared of the Quaternion. This operation is cheaper than Length().
member.returns: The length squared of the Quaternion.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Normalize(System.Numerics.Quaternion)
member.summary: Divides each component of the Quaternion by the length of the Quaternion.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Conjugate(System.Numerics.Quaternion)
member.summary: Creates the conjugate of a specified Quaternion.
member.param: The Quaternion of which to return the conjugate.
member.returns: A new Quaternion that is the conjugate of the specified one.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.Inverse(System.Numerics.Quaternion)
member.summary: Returns the inverse of a Quaternion.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.CreateFromAxisAngle(System.Numerics.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a Quaternion from a vector and an angle to rotate about the vector.
member.param: The angle, in radians, to rotate around the vector.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.Quaternion.CreateFromYawPitchRoll(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new Quaternion from the given yaw, pitch, and roll, in radians.
member.param: The yaw angle, in radians, around the Y-axis.
The pitch angle, in radians, around the X-axis.
The roll angle, in radians, around the Z-axis.

member.summary: Creates a Quaternion from the given rotation matrix.

member.summary: Interpolates between two quaternions, using spherical linear interpolation.

The second Quaternion rotation in the series.
member.returns: A new Quaternion representing the concatenation of the value1 rotation followed by the value2 rotation.
